靶向FGFR突变为骨骼疾病的骨骼修复提供了新的希望已知成纤维细胞生长因子受体（FGFR）基因的功能增益突变会引起一系列骨骼疾病，例如颅突变和软骨增生，这严重影响了颅面和下颌骨的发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/targeting-fgfr-mutations offers-new-hope-for-bone-bone-bone-bone-repair-in-skeletal-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/targeting-fgfr-mutations offers-new-hope-for-bone-repair-bone-repair-in-skeletal-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b518AAA-8B7C-4915-B4D3-04DBDFA7639F Fri, 21 Feb 2025 12:49:40 -0500 Targeting FGFR mutations offers new hope for bone repair in skeletal disorders

新指南允许精选心脏异常的运动员参加竞争性运动最近的研究表明，根据今天在美国心脏协会的旗舰店中发表的联合科学陈述，在与临床医生分享了潜在风险的决策后，患有心血管异常的精选运动员可能能够安全参加竞争运动。并同时在美国心脏病学院的旗舰杂志JACC中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/latest-research-finds-people-with-clenta-with-clenta-nhert-conditions-may-play-play-competive-sports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/latest-research-finds-people-people-with-clentl-clance-clention-clenter-center-may-play-play-competive-sports.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=709031D1-8776-48D1-950B-35429F390FB3 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 12:07:00 -0500 New guidelines allow select athletes with heart abnormalities to participate in competitive sports
Luc7蛋白在有效的RNA剪接中起着至关重要的作用RNA剪接是一种对基因表达至关重要的细胞过程。将基因从DNA复制到Messenger RNA之后，将不编码蛋白质（称为内含子）的RNA的一部分切出，并将编码部分重新剪接。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/luc7-proteins-play-crucial-crucial-role-in-forke-rna-splicing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/luc7-proteins-play-clay-cucial-cucial-role-in-mole-in-felfficited-rna-splicing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=660A57B5-920D-45F6-9667-9667-9AD2CDC24447 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 11:51:16 -0500 LUC7 proteins play crucial role in efficient RNA splicing
探索EGCG在防止对乙酰氨基酚诱导的肝损伤方面的作用宣布了Acta Materia Medica Journal的新出版物。过度食用对乙酰氨基酚（APAP）已成为药物诱导的肝损伤（DILI）背后的主要罪魁祸首，N-乙酰基半胱氨酸是主要解毒剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/exploring-egcgs-role-in-protecting-against-acetaminophen-- aceetaminophen诱导的liver-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/exploring-egcgs-role-in-protecting-against-acetaminophen---acetaminophen--诱导liver-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d238d91e-0f5c-436e-b760-41b1b1eddd28e7 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 11:45:08 -0500 Exploring EGCG's role in protecting against acetaminophen-induced liver injury
新的3D组织成像技术增强了甲状腺肿瘤分析EMPA研究人员已经开发了针对甲状腺肿瘤的新的3D组织分析。这种特殊的X射线技术使用人工智能来更快，更精确的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/new-3d-tissue-imaging-mimaging-technique-enhances-thyhances-thyroid-tumor-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/new-3d-tissue-imaging-imaging-technique-enhances-thyhances-thyroid-tumor-analyalisy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=220071c0-fd9b-4168-8abe-8abe-8c27de197cff Fri, 21 Feb 2025 11:15:32 -0500 New 3D tissue imaging technique enhances thyroid tumor analysis
